group_1.textLeft: Oho...?

group_1.textRight: It's rare meeting you in a place like this.
I wonder, did you come here to buy some @fancy clothes?
(Like date clothes!)

group_1.textLeft: Eh-! @How'd you know?
Actually, it's for an important event... @One that will decide Master's future...

group_1.textRight: O-ohh... @My oh myyy~...!
(It sure is a date!)
So what's the other person like?

group_1.textLeft: Other person...?
(She mean the guests...?)
I'm not sure yet, @but I'm absolutely sure I won't mess up...

group_1.textRight: ...Ohh!
(Her future isn't being determined by a date...)
(So it must be a matchmaking meetup.)
...But, don't you think a furisode would be better?

group_1.textLeft: Too flashy!

group_1.textRight: Is it...?

group_1.textLeft: It may be... @Too grandiose...

group_1.textRight: (...Ah, is it more casual matchmaking?)

group_1.textLeft: Can't be too rough, but @I'd kinda like something with impact...
It's just...we haven't been able to make @up our minds...

group_1.textRight: If that's the problem, maybe I could help you out?

group_1.textLeft: By all means!
I'd love to hear your thoughts, Mitama!
This T-shirt ain't bad, is it!?

group_1.textRight: It is an...intriguing T-shirt, yes...
"I want love"...?

Hmm...that's too upfront. You need to charm them @[chara:101701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101701:motion_100][chara:101701:cheek_0][chara:101701:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101701:lipSynch_1]with your personality, not your words!

group_1.textLeft: ...You may just be right about that.

group_1.textRight: The shirt's a little flashy, but won't feel out of place... @How about this?

group_1.textLeft: Eh-! @That just looks like normal cutesy though.

group_1.textRight: It would let you appeal with your energy @and be fun with the parents, I'm musing?

group_1.textLeft: Amusing...? @[chara:301901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301901:cheek_0][chara:301901:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301901:lipSynch_1]It's funny clothing...!?

group_1.textRight: It's wonderful!
No matter who it is, @anyone would fall head over heels!
Master is giving off a different aura than usual... @This may be the one...

group_1.textLeft: If you two say so, @then I'll give it my all at the competition!

group_1.textRight: Eh-... @...Competition?
Mariko heeere.

group_1.textLeft: Ayaka heeere.

group_1.textCenter: Put us together: we're Mariko Ayakaaa!
Wait â€“ there ain't just one up here!

group_1.textRight: Hold on! Check it...
Haa~...

group_1.textLeft: Haa~...

group_1.textRight: By moving before the white of my breath disappears, @you'll see there's two of us!
...As if! @Naaa ha ha!

group_1.narration: "She really bombed that joke, didn't she?"
"Yeah... Definitely falling flat on all of them...!"
"She's so full of energy that it's fun just watching..."

group_1.textRight: And so...
That gap between my cuteness and corniness...? @They were so amused
[chara:301951:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]that I got a special prize at the competitiooon!

group_1.textLeft: ...Heey...about that event...  @Did it happen to be a....comedy competition?

group_1.textRight: Eh-...yeah. @What else did you think it would be?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing... @I'm just glad to have been of service.
(This whole affair has turned into a skit, hasn't it...)
